website_summaries.verdict: If the rest of your tech is Google-based, then getting a hybrid smartwatch running Google’s highly versatile Wear OS is exactly what you need. Its classic and highly customizable design are just icing on the cake.
pros: Stylish leather strap and stainless steel watch case
Google Assistant and GPS are built-in
Thousands of compatible Google Play apps
cons: Although you’ll probably place it on the charger when you go to bed anyway, 48 hours of battery life isn’t too impressive

customer_reviews.title: Well, it keeps time
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use the pay app. Watch requires you to have a PIN for that. Put in a PIN. Was able to pay through the watch the first time. Now watch locks 5 seconds after I unlock it - not enough time to pay or set up for a workout. Heart rate monitor worked for the first workout. After that it keeps telling me to tighten it on my arm to get my heart rate. It's tight enough that it leaves an imprint. Frustrating. Called customer service and got a very polite man, but his suggestions didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: seasong

customer_reviews.title: Died after 4 days!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hello... I have only had the Ticwatch C2 for 4 days and as of this morning it is completely worthless. Yesterday the watch started malfunctioning and freezing and had to be reset multiple times. Even after resetting the watch it still was acting glitchy but functional. This morning it started going haywire again and I noticed it hadn't charged overnight even though it had been on the charger. After a complete factory reset the watch wont even set up with Wear OS and now the battery is completely drained and can't do anything at all. Im incredibly disappointed since I was very much enjoying the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Completely died after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I'm really sad about this, because I really liked this watch. Super pretty and worked well until..... it died for no reason in the middle of the day. It had about half battery life. I tried charging it, but to no avail. It simply won't turn on. Needless to say, I'm returning it and will try out the Fossil smartwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Prettiest Smart Watch on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the watch. The rose gold AWS and light pink/flagstone band are pretty. The flower and other two interchangeable faces for the watch are different and attractive. The app is easy to install-just scan in & start playing with watch/app. The charging station is great-magnetic & works fast. What I don't care for, but not deal breakers-the band is a little shorter than I like. I have a wider wrist, from breaking it, and would have like just an inch more. Also, the battery does go fast if you leave the flower screen on. But if you put battery saver mode on, battery lasts quite some time. Otherwise, just charge everyday. Love my new watch!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a good smart watch
customer_reviews.text: The build of the watch is great. The battery life is as expected with most smart watches. I charge my watch every night when I charge my phone. The touch screen is great. My main complaint is that the "okay Google" and when you are talking into the speaker hardly works. Also, I wish the watch came with another watch band. The leather one isn't great with water. After awhile the band doesn't look great when you are washing your hands, cleaning dishes, or anything involving water. I recommend buying another watch band with a silicone material.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: For the pice it's pretty great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The battery life is to be expected with about 1 and a half days of usage. Very light weight and overall accurate to the touch screen. Update. I feel like the it's already started to slow down a little bit. The heart rate monitor doesn't seem to always work. Or perhaps is delayed in displaying the data. Voice command is ok but not what I'd expect from Google.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing my C2 Ticwatch for several months now. I do like the watch. It's great to be able to do so much from my wrist with out having to get my phone out. I do wish it had an actual sleep tracker, that's reason for 4 stars. Other than that and having to charge everyday I love it. I have gotten lots of compliments on it also. One thing I really love is being able to skip songs on music without having to have my phone on me. I can hook up phone to speaker and walk around the house and keep up with my music.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie  Goolsby

customer_reviews.title: Issue with charging cable solved by great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great smartwatch for the price. Other name-brand smart watches bundled with unnecessary apps / features I don't use. This is common with name-brand tech companies...they sell you 10% more gimmick features (2% which are actually useful and exclusive) for 100% mark-up. Only issue I have had with this watch is the charging cable stopped charging the watch. I contacted Mobvoi Customer Service, which sent a new charging cable within 2 or 3 days. Customer service was through 2 emails and two replies (no annoying phone calls). Very satisfied with the customer service. I would recommend the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Smart Watch
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the Ticwatch E, which I loved and inspired me to start a little smartwatch collection. The C2 is very sleek, nice leather straps, and has all the features I need in a smartwatch. Not only is the watch great, but when the charger stopped working, their customer service was very quick to respond and send me a new one (under warranty.) They also followed up to ensure that the new one was working. Great watch, great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Would not turn on out of box
customer_reviews.text: Well took it out of the box and it would not turn on...put it on the charger and nothing. Was weary when I ordered the c2 but it was on sale and the reviews made it seem like the best option for the price. Boxed it up to return it immediately and ordered the fossil gen 5 watch that night. That's coming in a few days and I hope it doesn't disappoint like the ticwatch c2 did.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Passin

customer_reviews.title: Nice smartwatch, would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: First of all, price and color are the main reasons that cause me to buy this watch. This smart has everything that we need in daily. If you want to get a smartwatch with all the normal function, but can't pay more than $200 for a watch, this is the watch you are looking for. Luck for me, I like this one. Since it is waterproof, I don't need to wrong when close to the water. Item came exactly as described in the listing. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: GraceLee

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite this is it is waterproof. I work at an aquarium and obviously do a lot of stuff that includes water. I've never had an issue with the watch. It has held up very well in a rough atmosphere(I'm not very careful with it). The screen has never scratched or chipped. I have no complaints. The charger stopped working on me a few months after buying it and customer service was great they sent me a replacement super quickly. All communication with the company was also easy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad smart watch, especially for someone that hasnt had one before.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty watch! I love the look. I am not used to watches so it does feel a bit chunky. Battery life is okay, it gets me through a day. I turned off the gesture feature to keep from draining the battery with normal movement throughout the day. I am still learning how to use it but it is so nice to be able to read a text or see who is calling without pulling out my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Watch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the watch for a fitness tracker and heart rate monitor watch all in one. But it doesn't seem to be working out for me. The apps for google fitness do not tell me enough info, like steps or heart rate watch is pretty keeps accurate time sends reminders and calls I don't wear it when I'm working outside because I'm afraid to damage it so there's my fitness not being tracked.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch on Prime day and so far so good! I wish there were more default faces with silver accents instead of gold, but that's just nitpicking. Heart rate sensor and pedometer seem to be relatively accurate, and it is easy to use. Touchscreen is a little laggy at times but catches up eventually. It was very easy to pair with my Samsung Note 9. I have relatively slim wrists and it is very comfortable to wear all day, and even at night; it's not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Smartwatch
customer_reviews.text: I'm an iPhone user, wanted a smartwatch but don't like the square face of the Apple Watch. I purchased this watch and it's amazing! It syncs with my iPhone and the round face is beautiful. Of course you have to follow recommendations to reduce the loss of battery life, but the battery lasts me about 1 day and a 1/2. I would not give five stars because I had to purchase a different band from a different company to match my complexion. I receive compliments all the time. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: The TicWatch C2 is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new TicWatch C2! It has plenty of different watch faces to fit both my mood and my needs. Plus there are a lot of different apps to choose from. So many in fact, that I'm still learning just how and when I want to use them all. My battery charges in about 60 minutes and I charge it every couple of days. Unlike my last fitness watch I have no problem reading my TicWatch in direct sunlight and my text messages are in a more more readable format. Like I said ... I love my new TicWatch C2!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Failed exactly 2 weeks after warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: The watch has been fine after an initial problem with charging the watch. But now 2 weeks to the day after my Ticwatch C2 is no longer under warranty, it won't turn on, just sits in the charger stand and buzzes every few seconds, while the otherwise unresponsive screen flashes "Ticwatch" now and then. I'll try troubleshooting but I have no doubt the problem is due to planned obsolescence so I'm not hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: TedLo

customer_reviews.title: It wasn’t love at first use... but...
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I will be honest and say I nearly returned this watch. My initial thoughts were, it’s clunky and doesn’t off much. BUT... after several days of use and learning, I’m so glad I didn’t return this watch. It’s fantastic, I love using it, and I constantly get compliments on it. If you buy one, you won’t regret it, just give it some time to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Battery is a huge let down.
customer_reviews.text: I will update my review as days go by. First the battery is really bad on this watch. I waited to set up the watch and start using after it was fully charged, I then checked the Wear OS app to check my battery and it only lasted about 5-6 hours after being fully charged and getting really warm. There’s a lag while using it. Will continue with this review later during the week. If the battery gets any worse, I will return the watch.
customer_reviews.author: ubaldo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this unless you're willing to buy a new charger every time the battery dies
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 1 star because there's no way to keep it charged, unless you buy new chargers every time the battery dies. There seems to be some issue with the cord in every charger made for this watch, because they all fry after only one use. Other than that, this was actually a great watch and worked perfectly. But it's of no use to anyone if you have to constantly buy chargers. Save your money and buy something more expensive with a better charger, if you want a smart watch that will work long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jo Pinnick

customer_reviews.title: In Love
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my new Ticwatch. I had the Fossil Sport and returned it because the battery life was horrible and I was having so many issues with viewing my messages and freezing. So far this watch has been nothing but flawless. I am able to read messages, reply to messages, and track all of my activity. You will not regret purchasing this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Shante

customer_reviews.title: Very bad battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery on 4 month old watch should not die within 6 - 7 hours. It starter to get worse after the first month. I performed reset on the watch and got the same results. This is just unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Shurik

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even turn on
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered not one, but two for me for a Xmas gift and neither even turned on after a whole day of charging. Luckily, I didn't want them anyway cause I'm not into that hi-tech crap, but my husband was pretty irritated that he didn't even get to play with them at all before I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Great smart watch. I like the smaller watch face better than the larger one on other models. Has all the features I wanted. Only things that I would improve are the battery life and the time the screen stays on: I'm a nurse and by the end of my 12 hour shift the watch is in battery saving mode and if I want to count respirations I have to keep refreshing the screen because it goes to sleep after 5 seconds and I can't see the second hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: If I could charge it I would love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second watch I ordered. The first one wouldnt charge upon arrival. The dealer replaced it right away. This second one will not charge now and I've only had it for a month and now it won't charge. I'm very upset because when its charged the watch works well. In fact I really like it. Its worthless if you cant charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware, Chargers WILL break if used with quick charging brick!
customer_reviews.text: Watch works great with no issues although, it is upsetting that they do not include a charging brick as using a quick charging brick will fry the charger (learned this the hard way and had to wait for a replacement which they happily shipped at no additional charge.). The lack of a charging brick is a minor issue however. (especially now that they've included a warning on the amazon listing which was not previously there.). Overall, I do recommend this watch, girlfriend loves it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Cole Doerr

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my watch took me a few days to fully get the hang of it but now i can do everything i wanted to! I got a screen protector on it n dont have any issues witht he touch screen at all. Battery last me about 2 days!! You dont need an extra ticwatch app as all the reviews i looked up recommended it but i found it was to annoying. I downloaded my apps straight to the watch and dont have any issues now!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great smartwatch
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I bought a smartwatch, I'm very satisfied! It looks great, and has multiple functions. I originally wanted to buy the Pro, but I felt it was too big. The size of the C2 is just right, and the waterproof performance is good. I like that you can change the background whenever you want. I do not regret this purchase at all. I hope that after wearing it for a while, I am still satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Christina S

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but trouble with this watch. It is difficult to get it to charge, you have to lay it just exactly on the base to connect. It came with 2 chargers which both "broke" within 3 months. I contacted Mobvoi saying watch no longer charges, they said it was a charger issue and sent me another (3rd one in 3 months!!). It worked fine for about a month, now the watch charges only to 25%, then as soon as removed from charger, drops to 8%. I am attempting to get a refund for this watch because I am tired of dealing with the problem. Save your money and buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, even after 3 mos
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love the watch. Have been using for 3 most now and it is so easy to use & easily sync's to apps. Make sure you watch the battery saving tip video on the Mobvoi site. Easy to see the face in direct sunlight, THAT IS A BIG WIN for this watch!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a year now, it's been quite reliable. Had some issues with it when trying to pair with a new phone, but managed to resolve it and it's been great! I started with a Pixel 2, now I have a Pixel 4, both perfectly compatible.
customer_reviews.author: The MKY

customer_reviews.title: Solid smart watch
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is really picky when it comes to wearables, I've got to admit that this was a solid pickup. The watch is bright and easily readable in daylight conditions, and the fit is really snug on my wrist. I personally use wearables when I exercise, and so far the watch held up exceptionally well! All the core smartwatch features are on it and the battery is lasting me through my day without too much issue. I give this a five star rating from my first impressions, and I'll see how this lasts me a few months down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great WearOS for a decent price!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the TicWatch E for around a year now, so I thought it was just time to get an upgrade. I'm loving this smartwatch so far: screen looks great, it seems snappier than my previous watch, sports tracking continues to work great and the extra button it's really useful as an app shortcut. It looks quite stylish, and materials are really great.
customer_reviews.author: Javier P.

customer_reviews.title: Step count/fitness tracking NOT accurate.
customer_reviews.text: REALLY wanted to like this watch. Step count does not track properly. Tried Google Fit with Google Fit watch screen interface and it was still in accurate. Not even close. Very frustrating. Wanted a smart watch to replace my fitbit. I am an avid fitness tracker and this was a disappointment. I track walks, runs, sleep, water intake you name it! Liked this watch because it was feminine and had good reviews. Tried everything! Used the help and support and read reviews and guides online. Spent way too much time trying to make it work. It looks like I will have to return it. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Clark

customer_reviews.title: Loving the product already and has everything needed for a smartwatch!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to get a watch that a high performing OS system will all the apps essentially for daily activity, but not spend too much. This watch filled all the checkmarks and am got it set up easily. I'm able to check my emails, messages and all other notifications easily. Not heavy and feels light when I have it on. I like the fact that I can change the interface or the look of the watch easily and add more if needed. Oh yeah, its great when I use the GPS on the phone as well. This will be a good start to keep track of my workouts and hopefully keep my new years resolution! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tenzin Choendhen Waleag

customer_reviews.title: A moto 360 revival
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of circular watch faces and have been since the motorola 360 and am glad ticwatch continued the tradition. they picked up where they left off. the watch is sleek and durable. the build is nice and seems very strong. the software is good, but that's really on android to get right. my only complaint is i wish for a better screen ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Ticwatch Google OS Smartwatch
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Wish there were more display faces to choose from but overall cool product. Only complaint (and this isnt with the product itself) is that there was no padding in the box when it arrived, so the item was bouncing around inside the box. No damage done from what I can tell but still frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Battery is good for 10 hrs only
customer_reviews.text: First I really liked this watch. But now, its become annoying. The battery cant even last 10 hours. And I just use it for notifications.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. I bought several cheaper watches that were a waste of money, old saying you get what you pay for. I'm sure there are even better watches for more money but for now I'm liking this one.
customer_reviews.author: Zann

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: I really love my watch it's pretty cool but the apps are not easy to use, Google pay won't stay on there I can't keep my credit cards in Czech to pay with my watch. And there's no sound for an alarm, that's the only reason I would need sound on a watch is to wake me up and it doesn't do it. But I do really like the watch. It's beautiful classy and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Free JJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice designed smartwatch
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife, she using it for almost a year and happy with the choice. The first thing to notice, it is well designed to complement women's looks. The system continues to run smoothly, the display is sharp and clear and it helps to have auto-brightness for outdoor. Battery life is good for Wear OS devices category, easily enough for one-day usage with usual activities like reading notifications, Google Assistant search, steps, and heart tracking, etc. Definitely will recommend especially when on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge at all after a month.
customer_reviews.text: One month in, 2 days past the Amazon return window and this thing won't charge. Before this happened I loved the watch. I also have the Galaxy and Moto watches and I've never experienced such issues. Now on my third charger.
customer_reviews.author: Tunia

customer_reviews.title: At least it looked good
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning mine but nothing against Mobvoi, I think WearOS is still a mess. For someone who likes more classic watch looks the C2 looks terrific. My main goal was to limit accessing my phone but found anything other than short replies to be a pain. I also found the watch sluggish and having problems with apps even from Google. With Apple so far ahead against WearOS I think it's well past time for Google to get serious about their watch platform.
customer_reviews.author: Donald D. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this watch for 2 Days now and yes (depending on how you use the watch) the battery does in fact last 2 days. The overall feel and size of the watch is exactly like a traditional watch, so it's not too big nor too small. Just the right size. The watch runs pretty fast, although I would suggest not trying to install everything into at once when you first connect to it. Make sure that they system update is finished first. Other than that, the watch is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gold Vue

customer_reviews.title: Good wear OS watch.
customer_reviews.text: It works good for notifications, information, and step counting for myself. Touch screen is very responsive with little or no lag. Battery life is what I expect, but your mileage may vary depending on your use.
customer_reviews.author: WA_Bob

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love my new smart watch. The package was sealed and had protective seal on face, however, there are still visible scratches. Not too happy about that but overall love the watch so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch with great features.
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch for my mom and she's happy with it. Had an issue with the charger and the customer service was great. They sent me a replacement charger for free.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Initial impression - it is a good smart watch
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying the better battery life compared with my previous watch. I do not think the touch screen is as sensitive as I have experienced before, but it is not bad. I have not tried the app. I just synced it through the Wear app.
customer_reviews.author: scottelvr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smartwatch! Worth every single dolar
customer_reviews.text: This is my first real smartwatch, i was using a Mi Band 3 before, but i feel that this wasn't a full experience of a wereable device can offer, so i got this Ticwatch C2 after watch so many review videos and read a lot of websites looking for a smartwatch to buy, and i think that this is the best smartwatch for the price. It comes with NFC for Google Pay, the WearOS works fine, so many functions and watchfaces, and the design is beautiful, i can use it everywhere. Thanks Mobvoi to make this masterpiece and also a huge thanks to Amazon Prime to delivery my order in just 1 day.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme Guedes

customer_reviews.title: Ticwatch C2. The $500 watch for $150.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful watch. First watch I have worn with consistancy for many years. It just works. Battery life is more than enough. Charges in a very short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: William McCarver

customer_reviews.title: A great watch
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that it would be too big. It is a bit big, but it still looks great. I love all of the features. The usability is very google like e.g. it is easy to use. My previous watch was a Samsung. I can't image spending that much money again. This is better!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthanne

customer_reviews.title: my second TicWatch
customer_reviews.text: This is my second TicWatch and it's a fantastic watch. Very fast, very light, great operating system and app store. Chic design, very stylish. There are many positives to it. The fitness tracking is correct and it has done a good job recording my workout! So if you go to the gym without your phone it's fine as long as they have wifi. positives though that that one thing is swept under the rug. It really enjoy this watch especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Huhu

customer_reviews.title: Ticwatch C2
customer_reviews.text: I realy enjoy this watch.Display is great.It is good that they are suported by google - lots of apps. Battery is like for 2 days, it realy depends how often and what apps are you using. I also tried to pay - no problem in USA, but in EU Google Pay doesn't work in all countries. I had some problems but Mobovi helped me as they know. They sent me new watch because the old one did not work well. It was easy and great at the same time. Than you Mobovi.
customer_reviews.author: David152

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Smartwatch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this smartwatch and I loved it. It had good features, build quality was solid and all at a great price. A few months into using it I noticed that the battery was draining too quickly. It went down about 20% in the span of an hour. I contacted the Mobvoi about the issue. They were friendly and prompt. They quickly sent me a replacement watch and I've continued to use without an issue. It is definitely a great smartwatch for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Byron B

customer_reviews.title: Will not turn on.
customer_reviews.text: After researching watches for a few weeks, I settled on the TicWatch C2. Excited I charged for 8 hours, will not turn on, nor will it turn on while it's in the charger. No lights, no screen, etc. Returning for a different brand. Very disappointed as it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Cory H.

customer_reviews.title: Average price for an average watch.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very average. I was expecting it to be a bit better. But i guess fue the price is about as good as its going to get.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F. Rosa

customer_reviews.title: What the heck.
customer_reviews.text: It will not link to my Google assistant. Will not pick up my voice. Nor link to phone. Wanted to up grade from my tic c2 not worth it. Returned this watch and ended up with the pro version. Dont waste your time nor monies.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn wittke

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch! Battery needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch! The interface is crisp and nice, and a great watch for Android users. The only thing I don't like about this watch is the battery life. I have to charge it every single day.
customer_reviews.author: A. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very useful easy to use, touch screen you can even see your watsapp pictures as they arrive, nice for travellinf google maps. An excellent choice!
customer_reviews.author: julian jaramllo b

customer_reviews.title: Warranty service
customer_reviews.text: I like my TicWatch C2 and was upset when it stopped working after 11 months. I contacted Mobvoi for a warranty claim. They were very responsive and sent me a brand new watch once the broken one was in the mail to them. I received the new watch within a few days and am now happily wearing the watch again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality.
customer_reviews.text: The the c2. Battery last me 2 days, and the metal housing has a great feel. The band feels like cheap fake leather so I will be swapping that out. But over all this watch is great. Just wish it had a microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: Strap turns color
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this watch. It was a gift from my husband for Christmas. I am disappointed that I only have had it for two weeks and the strap is turning black.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lemmons

customer_reviews.title: Spend More Money on a Nicer Google Smartwatch (with a longer life), it'll be worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought on prime day as a cheaper alternative to another smart watch, but would've been better off forking over more money. Watch died after less than 3 months use. They say this watch is a good value, but I disagree when it has that short of a life. Functionality was ok while it lasted. Often would stay locked despite having just unlocked the watch and has a pretty short battery life, especially right before it died altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent watch while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this watch, but it only lasted 7 months and then it died. For the price, it should last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: DediPow

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but a bit needy.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and you can change the look if you get tired of it. However, it wants to be synced to your phone constantly - I think it uses the GPS and maybe some other things. It is not too hard to figure out all the functions, but there is not a detailed users' manual, paper or online, that I could find. Battery life is about 2 days without recharging.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was really enjoying the watch, it synced well with my phone and I enjoyed its features but after day 4 with it the screen started acting up and it kept flipping to different screens and then the screen would be so big that I wouldn't be able to fix it. Then the language would change from English to Swedish then to Japanese. Finally I shut it off and I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: t.navin

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek but flawed
customer_reviews.text: I get a ton of compliments on it. And love that you can customize. However, the battery sucks- sometimes doesn't make a day. Also you can not change the screen orientation.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kupres

customer_reviews.title: Simple and feature-rich! A great deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to setup and use. Had an issue with the device powering off during the first charge cycle, but it has been flawless since. Leather band got a little sticky somehow but that may have been my fault. Much simpler and less expensive than other watches I have tried. Would definitely recommend this for someone who wants something with a classic look but is also customizable.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN BURKE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn't last as long as advertised unless rarely used. But works great, easy to use, and the screen has great graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that such a small device allows for NFC payments. Payments for me have never been easier with just a tap from my watch! The sleek design almost makes it look like a regular watch, super stylish! Great straps that are comfortable to wear for the whole day. My first smart watch and the TicWatch C2 has given me a great experience so far. Overall a great watch to buy for it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Jasvinder Singh

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly; no longer charges
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my partner, new to Android Wear devices. It lasted for all of a month before it wouldn't accept a charge, even with a new cable. It didn't leave a great impression of Android Wear devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Sylvis

customer_reviews.title: Had to tap twice for it to pick up my touch
customer_reviews.text: About 50% of the time, the screen wouldn't pick up my tap until I tapped twice. Got annoying very quick. Everything else about the watch was very nice. Only returned because of the screen issue
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: beautiful rose gold, good value, short battery life
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of this watch. I had the moto 360 rose gold before and have been looking for something similar since it died. This watch is a nice price (under $200) but the battery life is short! I use it with the screen auto-off and by 10 pm it's almost dead. Also, it is a bit thick, but I can get over that. Overall I like the look, the 2 button customization and nfc payment.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Orrock

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful and works great. I have not tried the water resistance or the google pay. I will try and update later. As far as I am concerned it works wonderfully and it has great voice recognition so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mimisloved

customer_reviews.title: Charging issue (resolved)
customer_reviews.text: Watch stop charging after two month s of use! Update: The company promptly responded and sent me two additional chargers with fixed the problem. My watch has been fully functional since with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Ersilyn Martin

customer_reviews.title: Respond to messages
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can send text messages from your watch. I love that it's waterproof and you can shower with it on. I wish it had a better battery life and sometimes it will disconnect from the phone so I dont always get my messages from the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Shannons

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, The watch appears to be sold new when in reality they are used or refurbished.
customer_reviews.text: The watch I recieved was not new it had already been used. Once I turned the watch on it had another person's gmail profile giving access to this previous owner's text messages and emails saved on the watch. I attempted to return the watch as soon as I realized that the watch was not new, but I was unable to return it due to it showing not delivered on my account.
customer_reviews.author: Endy Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Charger didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I linked my phone and watch. Put on charger to continue charging. No charge! Totally dead. Charger not working. I contacted Amazon. Sending me a new charger. I was starting to download apps when I couldn't charge the watch. Fingers crossed that this charger works.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love. I am a gadget lover and already own an Apple Watch and a MiBand 3 before making purchase of the TicWatch and I can say I am more than satisfied. It came out of the box just as pictured. Beautiful, sleek, and elegant. All the functionality is there and easy to use. Now I am deprecating my MiBand and giving my Apple Watch to another family member. To my surprise the box already came with a charger so I am putting the extra free charger in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Yang, Fan

customer_reviews.title: My bad experience
customer_reviews.text: This product malfunctioning out the box would not charge at all had to return
customer_reviews.author: Robert Baul

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life and laggy system
customer_reviews.text: - Battery life lasts 7-10 hours - No ambient display - Lags at times (especially after waking up from locking, or using those fancy watch face apps) + One of the nicer looking smart watches + Not too heavy + Decent smart watch at a decent price + Doesn't heat up so much (as compared to Apple Watch)
customer_reviews.author: Fatihah

customer_reviews.title: Not for IPhone
customer_reviews.text: The watch was very pretty. I really liked how customizable the face screen was. Unfortunately it didn’t let me text or call back from my iPhone or connect to my google home. It also wasn’t very accurate with my heart rate when I took a yoga class. So I went with an iwatch. But if you have an adroid I don’t think you’d have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: No phone conversation ability. First E Watch had that capability at 100 dollars now
customer_reviews.author: Nick Franceschetti

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Small and convenient. Google pay and various exercise tracking are good. The heart rate is not accurate unless it's very tight. Also doesn't have different band sizes. Battery lasts for about 1.5 days for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch with a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality and gorgeous look. I prefer a circle watch to Apple’s square watch. Plus it’s almost half off compare to Apple Watch. Features are great and OS is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Zhuoran Fan

customer_reviews.title: This watch is no good
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your time or money on this watch i ordered 3 and everyone wouldnt work
customer_reviews.author: michael w.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my wife and so far she really likes it and has no complaints. This is our second Ticwatch and we have had no problems. I do wish it had a speaker though
customer_reviews.author: Stef/dav

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted for a smart watch.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smart watch and have had it for a month. I like everything about it and has the apps I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: D. Skinner

customer_reviews.title: It's a great watch
customer_reviews.text: For the part I am very happy with this watch My only complaint with the tic watch is the pulse sensor will somehow get stuck trying to read my pulse and so I have to play around with it but that's the only complaint so far and it's a minor one.
customer_reviews.author: Karlena Davis

customer_reviews.title: Less than one month no charging.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the watch but after less than a month, it no longer charges. The charger doesn't work at all and the watch won't even turn off now. I am now thinking about returning the watch and getting a Fitbit watch instead. Hopefully it will work better if I decide to return ticwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E. Foltz

customer_reviews.title: How light and durable it is.
customer_reviews.text: Like that I don’t have to constantly have my phone next to me.
customer_reviews.author: mary beth

customer_reviews.title: BAD CHARGER
customer_reviews.text: Came with a charger that does NOT work, giving two stars because If I can't charge it, I obviously can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Smart IoT veteran
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty cool watch. Do not open the network, bluetooth and apps with the screen is always on. It can be used for 48-50 hours (used to work in smart wear industry -- its extremely hard to keep a long battery life). Pixels are good to pair up with. Overall it's worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Huanhuan

customer_reviews.title: Good watch and good service
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife as a birthday gift. She likes it really well. Had a small issue with the charger that Amazon and Mobvoi took care of quickly
customer_reviews.author: Rob Giddings

customer_reviews.title: Mobvoi products is the best to buy..ticwatch c2 is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the best iOS watche on the market,,forget the rest buy from mobvoi..ticwatch c2 is the best and I also have the ticwatch s..
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Osafo

customer_reviews.title: She said love it
customer_reviews.text: But this for my wife and she love it. Major browny points for me😁
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t reply to texts!? Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: This watch is cute if your only looking to track your heartbeat or fitness. However it does not reply back to messages but it gives you notifications about them. Super disappointed because that’s why I bought it. I can’t even return it because it been past the return policy no happy.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia T.

customer_reviews.title: 6 months later.....
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 6 months. Was good up until then. But for some reason it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa DeMaio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's my first smartwatch, I'm not a fitness person, I haven't tested it on workouts, but overall it's been great! I love the functionalities and the design, is comfortable and fashionable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Katia Olay

product_meta.title: TicWatch C2 Wear OS Classic Design Smartwatch for Women with Build-in GPS Waterproof NFC Payment Heart Rate Monitoring for iOS and Android
feature_bullets: Classic Design - Genuine leather straps paired with a stainless steel watch case accentuate a slim and classic watch design. Personalize your watch by choosing between hundred of watch faces and straps.

Get Connected at a Glance - Download your favorite apps via Google Store and stay in the moment with smart ways to receive notifications and see who’s calling, without pulling out your phone. Google Assistant built-in.
NFC Payment - Use Google Pay to purchase directly from your wrist at millions of places without fumbling around for your wallet.
24hr HRM and Build-in GPS - Workout without your phone. Google Fit and TicMotion make it easy to get motivated, stay balanced and track your health right from your wrist.

Warranty policy: we and our engineer always stand behind our products and hope each customer could be 100% satisfied with our product. 30-day money-back guarantee for any reason, 12-month warranty for quality-related issues.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars661 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
